Constructor with all params.

Parameters:
id - primary key
isbn - ISBN number
volumeId - unique identifier from metadata provider
title - work's title
author - work's author
pubDate - work's publication date
addDate - date work was added to DB
dueDate - date work is due to library
closedDate - date work was marked closed by user
state - LibStatus.STATUS text value
